title: Admissible inference rules in temporal linear logics based at integer numbers
abstract: Paper presented at 9th Asian Logic Conference in Novosibirsk, 16-19 August 2005. Full-text is available at http://www.ict.nsc.ru/ws/ALC-9/9092/Rybakov.pdf
